item.title: Desktop Docs - Advanced Image Search for Mac
item.description: Transform how you find and organize media with Desktop Docs' advanced search. Supporting HEIC, JPG, PNG, GIF, MP4, MOV, and more formats with AI-powered visual search and intelligent organization.

item.title: Adding Custom Icons to Controls with ControlExtensions | Uno Tech Bites
item.description:
In this Uno Tech Bite, we show you the easiest way to add icons to TextBox, PasswordBox, and more using ControlExtensions.Icon from Uno Themes ‚Äî no ControlTemplate wrangling required.
We‚Äôll walk you through how to implement this feature in real-world apps like Uno Chefs using two methods, directly in code, or using the visual designer Hot Design.
item.author: (Uno Platform)

#abp #abpframework #dotnet
item.author: (Volosoft)

item.title: Breaking the Sorting Barrier for Directed Single-Source Shortest Paths
item.description: We give a deterministic $O(m\log^{2/3}n)$-time algorithm for single-source shortest paths (SSSP) on directed graphs with real non-negative edge weights in the comparison-addition model. This is the first result to break the $O(m+n\log n)$ time bound of Dijkstra's algorithm on sparse graphs, showing that Dijkstra's algorithm is not optimal for SSSP.

item.title: Leadership Principles for Software Engineers: Interview With Adrian Stanek
item.description:
If you think leadership topics only apply to managers and above, think again! In this video interview, I was joined by Adrian Stanek. We got chatting about leadership principles, and they're all applicable to different roles and levels.
I really like how Adrian framed his four pillars. The concepts rang very true for me, and I think there's a lot of value here for software engineers.
Thanks for the chat, Adrian!

item.title: On .NET Live - CodeComplete: The Day AI Writes Your Next App
item.description:
In this week's episode, Microsoft MVP Mabrouk Mahdhi demonstrates how developers can seamlessly integrate OpenAI and Azure OpenAI APIs into their C# applications to automate code generation and enhance productivity. The goal is to help developers understand how AI can transform the way they build applications, making development faster, smarter, and more efficient.
